value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

value.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
value.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

value.title: Build a chat bot with the Azure portal
value.excerpt: Create and test a basic chat bot using the Azure portal

value.title: Build and query a Delta Lake
value.excerpt: Build and query a Delta Lake

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

value.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Cognitive Vision Services detects faces, tags and classifies images, and identifies objects.

value.title: Classify endangered bird species with Custom Vision
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cognitive Services Custom Vision to build a machine learning model that identifies the species of a bird in an image, to help with gathering data.

value.title: Use deep learning models to make predictions about specialized data
value.excerpt: Use convolutional neural networks and recurrent neural networks to analyze and predict images and text with TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Use deep learning models to make predictions about specialized data

value.title: Deploy batch inference pipelines with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Machine learning models are often used to generate predictions from large numbers of observations in a batch process. To accomplish this, you can use Azure Machine Learning to publish a batch inference pipeline.

value.title: Describe platform architecture, security, and data protection in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Describe platform architecture, security, and data protection in Azure Databricks

value.title: Design a bot conversation flow
value.excerpt: Learn the principles of good bot design and implement conversational flows, knowledge bots, and how to hand-off interactions to a human.

value.title: Explain machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Many decisions made by organizations and automated systems today are based on predictions made by machine learning models. It's increasingly important to be able to understand the factors that influence the predictions models make.

value.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in customer service
value.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise customer service to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in marketing
value.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise marketing organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in sales
value.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise sales organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Computer Vision API in Azure to identify facial details in pictures

value.title: Implement CI/CD with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Implement CI/CD with Azure DevOps

value.title: Discuss practices for responsible AI at Microsoft
value.excerpt: Discover how to translate your organization’s ethical principles into actionable guidance and tools for engineering teams and how AI can improve lives worldwide

value.title: Monitor data drift with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Changing trends in data over time can reduce the accuracy of the predictions made by a model. Monitoring for this data drift is an important way to ensure your model continues to predict accurately.

value.title: Monitor models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: After a machine learning model has been deployed into production, it's important to understand how it is being used by capturing and viewing telemetry.

value.title: Perform machine learning with Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Perform machine learning with Azure Databricks

value.title: Process streaming data with Azure Databricks structured streaming
value.excerpt: Process streaming data with Azure Databricks structured streaming

value.title: Recognize specific voices with the Speaker Recognition APIs in Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: This module guides you through learning about speaker recognition and how to use the Speaker Recognition APIs to identify specific people through their voices.

value.title: Deploy real-time machine learning services with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to register and deploy ML models as real-rim services with the Azure Machine Learning service.

value.title: Train and package an Azure machine learning module for deployment to IoT Edge device
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Tune hyperparameters with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Choosing optimal hyperparameter values for model training can be difficult, and usually involved a great deal of trial and error. With Azure Machine Learning, you can leverage cloud-scale experiments to tune hyperparameters.

value.title: Work with DataFrames columns in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Work with DataFrames columns in Azure Databricks

value.title: Cognitive Search - Azure Search with AI | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jacob Jedryszek joins Scott Hanselman to talk about about using Cognitive Services with Azure Search with your mobile and web apps. Skip hiring search experts who know what an inverted index is. Don't worry about distributed systems expertise to scale your service to handle large amount of data. And

value.title: How to get started with Azure Machine Learning Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with the Azure Machine Learning Service and how you can use it from Visual Studio Code.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit.  Create your free account

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.
